Package view

Class ViewUIMain

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
view.ViewUIMain
public class ViewUIMain extends javafx.application.Application
The view class which deals with displaying all elements of the podcast manager, collecting a users input to the GUI, and calling the appropriate methods to handle those interactions, allowing the user to interact with the program.
Author:
Akli Amrous, Rhys Davis, Joey Enslen, John Fourchy

    • createMenuBar

      private javafx.scene.control.MenuBar createMenuBar​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Creates a clickable menu interface that allows the user to perform the most important tasks such as pausing, playing, loading a new podcast, and exiting the program.
      Parameters:
      stage - - the stage to display the UI buttons on
      Returns:
      the MenuBar implementing the GUI buttons to control the program

    • createThemeMenu

      private void createThemeMenu​(javafx.scene.control.MenuBar menuBar)
      Creates a new Menu with multiple different buttons that allow the user to customize the colors of the application. This includes various preset options, as well as a random option.
      Parameters:
      menuBar - - the menu to add the color theme options to

    • createUI

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createUI()
      Creates a HBox filled with the necessary components of the podcast UI. This includes a pause, play, fastfoward, rewind, volume, playback speed, and podcast loading buttons, as well as functionality of these buttons.
      Returns:
      a HBox filled with the components of the podcast UI to control the media

    • podcastImage

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox podcastImage​(Episode episode)
      Sets the title, image, and author of the podcast playing.
      Parameters:
      episode - - the episode to display in the center of the player - grabs its information
      Returns:
      - A VBox with the title, image, and author of the podcast centered

    • episodeList

      private javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane episodeList()
      Creates a ScrollPane of episodes with the ability to click between the various episodes and play them. This method creates a unique button for each episode of a podcast that, when clicked, will automatically download the podcast for the user. It updates the title and author as necessary, as well as places all episode buttons inside a convenient ScrollPane allowing the user to easily switch between all episodes without adding too much visual clutter.
      Returns:
      a ScrollPane containing buttons for all episodes of a podcast and the ability to click between them
